profile:
AGM Renovations experts provide quality basement and Bathroom Renovation services throughout the GTA and the surrounding area. See our Service Area for the complete list of towns where our  renovation services are offered. We offer 100% satisfaction guarantee on our workmanship and offer competitive prices with exceptional quality.

Expect more and when you need the best; trust AGM Renovations. We guarantee that you will be completely satisfied, which means that you don't pay until you are satisfied.
Our mission is to be committed to excel in the work we do. We are committed to excel and maintain a sense of pride in our all we do!

products: AGM Renovations, Basement finishing, Basement Renovations, Basement Reno, Finishing Basements, Basement Company, Finished Basements, Basement Expert, Finished Basements Company, Bathroom Renovations
services:
AGM Renovations offers Complete basement and Bathroom renovations packages from the professional design through the professional cleaning including:

Drywall- We employ only professional drywall installers and our goal is deliver complete satisfaction to each and every client with the quality of our workmanship and our prompt, reliable service.
    
Taping- Our drywall taping techniques will bring a high quality smooth finish, with a level of excellence you will take pride in.

Painting- We include all wall priming, painting of ceilings, baseboards, casing, crown and cove moldings into our basement construction packages
    
High Grade Laminate Flooring- is standard in our basement renovations packages.

Tiling- Shower, bathroom, or kitchenette tiling will be done by professional tile installers who are employed directly by AGM. A 2 year unlimited warranty is provided to you standard when you finish your basement with AGM
   
Plumbing- Our licensed plumbers will ensure that no problem is left unsolved and you can be sure that any drain or other plumbing defects left by the original house builder will be fixed effectively.

Electrical- We are committed to providing fully licensed electrician service as part of our standard package. Should you ever require an electrical certificate when you decide to sell your property, we will be happy to provide it to you

profile:
Dear  Customers, Dear Friends
 
Thank you very much for your support, warm feedbacks and all references that we are getting from you. 
We are here to serve you and will gladly accept the opportunity to exceed your expectations. We are so passionate about the quality of our work and the treatment of our customers, we want you to know just what you can expect when you buy your marble or granite counter tops from Marble Treasure.
 
    The reason we are in business is to serve you.
    Your concerns, needs and desires are our top priority.
    You are not dependent on us; we are dependent on you.
    Your inquiries are not an interruption of our work; they are the reason for it.
    You do us a favor when you call and we feel privileged to serve you.
    You represent an integral part of our business; just like our staff.
    You tell us what you want and we will strive to fulfill that want.
    You are the client. It is not our place to argue with you but to see that you are satisfied.
    You are deserving of the most courteous and attentive treatment we can provide.
    You are our lifeblood. We exist to exceed your expectations.
 
Sincerely,
 
Marble Treasure Inc Team
 
 
Showroom hours:
 
Monday â€“Thursday 10am-7pm
Friday from 10am-6pm and Sat from 10am-4pm
Sunday closed

profile:
Welcome Home.

Home Options Made Easy is a renovation company that does it all including exclusive design appointments in our brand new Design Center. Specializing in renovations, remodeling, alterations, custom build, interior design, and products. It all starts at HOME.

When you visit our showroom, our products instantly speak for themselves in their quality and appeal, but you may need a few minutes more to appreciate the services we provide. Whether youâ€™re a DIY'er, working with a contractor, or you need us to help with every step of your project, you can count on us.

Design Services
Our in-house lead designer has a Bachelors Degree in Interior Design, and our whole team is friendly and approachable. Theyâ€™re looking forward to discussing your kitchen and your ideas, and their expertise will help you to make informed decisions about cabinets, fixtures, hardware, and more to ensure everything works together seamlessly. Whatever your style, weâ€™ll help you create a kitchen you love, from how it looks to how it flows and functions.

Renovation Contractors
Our renovation team has a collective contracting experience that exceeds 35 years. In collaboration with you, our designers, and our suppliers, weâ€™ll transform your kitchen from everyday to exceptional.


Don't know what design works best for you? Let us put you in touch with your creative side. Maybe you know exactly what you want, we can help put those plans in motion!

We work with some of the most reputable suppliers out there, let us show you what they have to offer!

Come to visit us at 130 Saunders Rd, Unit 7, Barrie

profile: Sunshine Kitchens & Cabinets was established by Peter Stacey in 1988 in Orillia to provide quality kitchen and cabinetry products and services from the Greater Toronto Area in the south to Huntsville in the north. David Stacey acquired the firm in 1994 and opened a 2,500 square foot showroom/workshop. The company has continued to specialize primarily in the residential millwork market with emphasis on new and renovated kitchens.
